com.biokey.client.services

Class ClientInitService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.biokey.client.services.ClientInitService
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ClientStateModel.IClientAnalysisListener, ClientStateModel.IClientKeyListener, ClientStateModel.IClientStatusListener

    public class ClientInitService
extends java.lang.Object
implements ClientStateModel.IClientStatusListener, ClientStateModel.IClientKeyListener, ClientStateModel.IClientAnalysisListener
    Service that retrieves the client state from the disk and OS and ensures that it has not been corrupted. If the local data does not exist, then the service prompts the user to login and download the client state.

      • retrieveClientState

        public void retrieveClientState()
        Entry point into this service. Tries to retrieve the client state and in the process calls the checkCorrupt() and at least one of the login functions.

      • retrieveFromPreferences

        Retrieve model from preferences.

      • saveClientState

        public void saveClientState()
        Called when the status of the client changes. Saves the entire state to Preferences.
